General.Name: Communication & System Solution Public Company Limited
General.Description: Communication & System Solution Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, distributes and installs production equipment for electricity, water, air conditioning, and telecommunication systems in Thailand. The company operates through two segments: Distribution Electrical Equipment and Installation Service segment. The Distribution Electrical Equipment segment supplies electronic cables and other electrical systems equipment, and fire protection equipment. The Installation Service segment designs and installs telecommunication and fire protection systems. The company also distributes and installs tubes. Communication & System Solution Public Company Limited was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Nonthaburi, Thailand.
